# GeoTox

`GeoTox` open-source R software package for characterizing the risk of
perturbing molecular targets involved in adverse human health outcomes
based on exposure to spatially-referenced stressor mixtures via the
GeoTox framework - otherwise known as source-to-outcome-continuum
modeling. The package, methods, and case-studies are described in
[Messier, Reif, and Marvel, 2025, Human
Genomics](https://doi.org/10.1186/s40246-024-00711-8).

The GeoTox framework was first described in [Eccles et al.Â A geospatial
modeling approach to quantifying the risk of exposure to environmental
chemical mixtures via a common molecular target. Sci Total Environ. 2023
Jan 10;855:158905.](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/36152849/)

## Installation

``` r
install.packages("GeoTox")
```

## Development Version

The development version can be installed from GitHub.

``` r
#install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("NIEHS/GeoTox")
```

## Overview

Figure 1 below shows the steps in the source-to-outcome-continuum or
GeoTox modeling framework that is capable in the `GeoTox` package. blue
text nodes represent an object and green text, rounded nodes represent a
methodology or function required to go from one to the next. The
`GeoTox` package uses R S3 object-oriented programming to create the
**GeoTox** object. The **GeoTox** object is a list that contains all of
the information required to run the analysis including tracking
exposure, assays, dose-response, and geospatial referencing.

![GeoTox](reference/figures/GeoTox.png)  
*Figure 1: Overview of the steps in the GeoTox framework*

## Getting Started

Please refer to the [package website](https://niehs.github.io/GeoTox/)
for a detailed description of how to use `GeoTox`.

## Citation

For citation information, please refer to our [CITATION
file](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/inst/CITATION).

## Issues and Contributions

To add or edit functionality, open a pull request into the main branch
with a detailed description of the proposed changes. Pull requests must
pass all status checks, and then will be approved or rejected by the
GeoTox maintainers.

Utilize [GitHub issues](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/issues) to
notify the authors of bugs, questions, or recommendations. Identify each
issue with the appropriate label to help ensure a timely response.

# Package index

### GeoTox S3 Object

Functions using a GeoTox object

- [`GeoTox()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/GeoTox.md)
  [`plot(`*`<GeoTox>`*`)`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/GeoTox.md)
  : GeoTox S3 object
- [`calculate_response()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/calculate_response.md)
  : Calculate response
- [`compute_sensitivity()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/compute_sensitivity.md)
  : Compute response sensitivity to parameter variation.
- [`plot_sensitivity()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/plot_sensitivity.md)
  : Plot results of sensitivity analysis.
- [`sensitivity_analysis()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/sensitivity_analysis.md)
  : Perform sensitivity analysis
- [`set_boundaries()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/set_boundaries.md)
  : Set GeoTox boundaries
- [`set_hill_params()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/set_hill_params.md)
  : Set Hill parameters for a GeoTox object.
- [`set_population()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/set_population.md)
  : Set population data
- [`simulate_population()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/simulate_population.md)
  : Simulate population data

### Simulate

Functions that perform Monte Carlo simulation

- [`sample_Css()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/sample_Css.md)
  :

  Sample from pre-generated `C_ss` data

- [`simulate_age()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/simulate_age.md)
  : Simulate ages

- [`simulate_exposure()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/simulate_exposure.md)
  : Simulate external exposure

- [`simulate_inhalation_rate()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/simulate_inhalation_rate.md)
  : Simulate inhalation rates

- [`simulate_obesity()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/simulate_obesity.md)
  : Simulate obesity status

### Calculate Functions

Functions that calculate various metrics

- [`calc_concentration_response()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/calc_concentration_response.md)
  : Calculate the mixture response from one of three different
  approaches: IA, GCA, or Hazard Quotient

- [`calc_independent_action()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/calc_independent_action.md)
  : Independent Action

- [`calc_internal_dose()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/calc_internal_dose.md)
  : Calculate internal chemical dose

- [`calc_invitro_concentration()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/calc_invitro_concentration.md)
  :

  Calculate *in vitro* concentration

- [`resp_quantiles()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/resp_quantiles.md)
  : Get response quantiles

### Plot

Plotting functions

- [`plot_exposure()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/plot_exposure.md)
  : Plot exposure data.
- [`plot_hill()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/plot_hill.md)
  : Plot Hill equation fits.
- [`plot_resp()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/plot_resp.md)
  : Plot response data

### Auxiliary

Auxillary and helper functions

- [`fit_hill()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/fit_hill.md)
  : Fit 2- or 3-parameter Hill model

- [`hill_conc()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/hill_conc.md)
  : Hill model concentration

- [`hill_val()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/hill_val.md)
  : Hill model response

- [`get_fixed_age()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/get_fixed_age.md)
  :

  Get `C_ss` Data for Fixed Age

- [`get_fixed_css()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/get_fixed_css.md)
  :

  Get Fixed `C_ss` Data

- [`get_fixed_obesity()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/get_fixed_obesity.md)
  :

  Get `C_ss` Data for Fixed Obesity Status

- [`get_fixed_other()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/get_fixed_other.md)
  :

  Get median `C_ss` Values

- [`get_fixed_params()`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/get_fixed_params.md)
  :

  Get `C_ss` Data for Fixed `C_ss` Generation Parameters

### Datasets

Package datasets

- [`geo_tox_data`](https://github.com/NIEHS/GeoTox/reference/geo_tox_data.md)
  : GeoTox Data
